description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $918.5K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Crc D Atnq. The average
  contract duration was 2.37 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.1M. The longest
  contract was 6 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $5.3M.
